inputs.name: modelPath
inputs.purpose: Property path to bind in the model

inputs.name: property
inputs.purpose: The property of the control to bind data to

inputs.name: Event
inputs.purpose: The event in control to bind to for 2-way data binding

inputs.name: BindingManager
inputs.purpose: For injection the dependency on mvvm.BindingManager using dependency injection

inputs.name: ModelProvider
inputs.purpose: Injecting the model provider instead of the binding manager. This is mainly used for injecting scopes in mvvm.Repeater binders

inputs.name: Indexer
inputs.purpose: For indexed binding operations. For example binding a specific column in a matrix to the X property of an sui.Graph control
